data.prayer: Spirit, help get online Bibles and Bible apps onto the phones of the 215,898 people who claim to know you, so they can read everyday.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Nord-Ubangi, Democratic Republic of the Congo
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, convict the 57,302 believers in Nord-Ubangi to be holy and righteous. Inspire them to gather in small groups for accountability and spiritual growth.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 5 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage the church of Nord-Ubangi, Democratic Republic of the Congo that they are blessed with every heavenly blessing.
data.verse: Blessed be the God and Father of our Lord Jesus Christ, who has blessed us with every spiritual blessing in the heavenly places in Christ

data.prayer: God, we pray for the believers in Nord-Ubangi, Democratic Republic of the Congo to be generous so that they would be worthy of greater investment by you.

Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in Nord-Ubangi, Democratic Republic of the Congo. Show them that faithfulness is more important than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.
Jesus, make yourself known to the 298,100 people living in Nord-Ubangi through the internet today.
data.verse: They have no speech, they use no words; no sound is heard from them. Yet their voice goes out into all the earth, their words to the ends of the world. In the heavens God has pitched a tent for the sun.

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage the church in Nord-Ubangi, Democratic Republic of the Congo to make the most of every opportunity.
data.verse: Be very careful, then, how you live—not as unwise but as wise, making the most of every opportunity, because the days are evil.

data.focus_label: Nord-Ubangi, Democratic Republic of the Congo
